about_the_game:
🏁 Final Apex: Race into the Future! 🚗💨

Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush in "Final Apex," an arcade racing game set in the near future where speed knows no bounds! Step into the driver's seat of seven unique and powerful cars, each with its own distinct stats and handling characteristics. It's time to unleash the full potential of futuristic racing!

🚀 Key Features:

🏎️ Seven Unique Cars: Choose from a diverse lineup of high-tech racing machines, each with its own strengths, weaknesses, and unique handling. Whether you prefer the precision of sleek sports cars or the raw power of futuristic muscle, find the perfect ride to dominate the tracks.

🌐 Thrilling Tracks: Brace yourself for heart-pounding action on 70 adrenaline-fueled tracks! Race through futuristic cityscapes, navigate challenging circuits, and conquer varied terrains. Every track offers a new challenge, ensuring that every race is a unique experience.

🌟 Career and Series Modes: Immerse yourself in the world of high-stakes racing with our career and series game modes. Rise through the ranks, compete in intense championships, and become the ultimate racing champion. The road to glory is paved with speed, skill, and determination.

🎉 Are you ready to revolutionize racing in the near future? Strap in, rev your engines, and leave your mark on the track in "Final Apex." The race begins now! 🏁

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or recent Linux distro
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS or recent Linux distro
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple silicon or dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple silicon or dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Final Apex

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush in "Final Apex," an arcade racing game set in the near future where speed knows no bounds! Step into the driver's seat of seven unique and powerful cars and it's time to unleash the full potential of futuristic racing!
